body:
For my package I have the following:

    depends_on('mpi')

since it is not restricted to any particular mpi implementation, but if openmpi is being selected (automatically or otherwise), I'd like to have a particular variant *required*. Eg, as pseudo-code

    depend_on('openmpi+thread_multiple', when="(mpi is openmpi)")

Adding this into `~/.spack/packages.yaml` isn't really an option since this doesn't work very well when distributing the package and would be rather error-prone.

What solutions are available?

I've tagged the usual suspects: @adamjstewart  @tgamblin @alalazo
title: need to specify preferred variant for mpi
